summary: Completed testing of Application Cancellation feature for Avenue UGC Platform. All backend tests pass (12/12 = 100%). Frontend UI testing confirms: Admin can cancel confirmed applications via admin panel, Creator can cancel their own confirmed applications via CreatorApplications page, status badges correctly show 'cancelled' status, and campaign slots are properly decremented when applications are cancelled.
critical_code_review_comments: Admin cancellation endpoint PUT /api/ugc/admin/applications/{id}/status?status=cancelled works correctly
Creator cancellation endpoint POST /api/ugc/applications/{id}/withdraw works correctly
Both endpoints properly decrement slots_filled when cancelling confirmed applications
Application status correctly updates to 'cancelled' with cancelled_at and cancelled_by fields
Deliverables associated with cancelled applications are also marked as cancelled
notify_application_cancelled function sends WhatsApp notification to admin
CreatorApplications page correctly displays cancelled applications with orange 'Cancelado' badge
Admin panel shows 'Cancelar' button for confirmed applications with confirmation dialog
CreatorDashboard has link to CreatorApplications page with data-testid='my-applications-link'
seed_data_creation: Created test applications for campaign 'Vení a AVENUE: viví el showroom y contalo a tu manera!' to test cancellation flows
context_for_next_testing_agent: Application cancellation feature is fully functional. Backend endpoints: PUT /api/ugc/admin/applications/{id}/status?status=cancelled (admin) and POST /api/ugc/applications/{id}/withdraw (creator). Frontend pages: /ugc/creator/applications (CreatorApplications.jsx) and admin panel (AdminCampaignManager.jsx). Status badges include 'cancelled' with orange color. Slots are properly managed when applications are cancelled.

admin_cancel_confirmed_application.details: Admin can cancel confirmed applications via PUT /api/ugc/admin/applications/{id}/status?status=cancelled. Status changes to 'cancelled', slots_filled decremented, cancelled_by='admin'

creator_cancel_confirmed_application.details: Creator can cancel their own confirmed applications via POST /api/ugc/applications/{id}/withdraw. Status changes to 'cancelled', slots_filled decremented, cancelled_by='creator'

slots_management.details: Campaign slots_filled is properly decremented when applications are cancelled, freeing up the slot

creator_applications_page.details: CreatorApplications page displays correctly with filters (Todas, En Espera, Confirmadas, Finalizadas), stats cards, and application cards with status badges

cancelled_status_badge.details: Cancelled applications show orange 'Cancelado' badge with warning message 'Tu participación fue cancelada. Podés aplicar a otras campañas.'

admin_cancel_button.details: Admin panel shows 'Cancelar' button for confirmed applications with confirmation dialog

dashboard_applications_link.details: CreatorDashboard has 'Aplicaciones' link in header with data-testid='my-applications-link'

email_notification.details: notify_application_cancelled function sends WhatsApp notification to admin when application is cancelled
